name: Avatris
description:
Avatris is a Tetris game for three players who play with the keyboard and two joysticks.

The game they play is pretty much the standard Tetris with the same shaped blocks using slightly brighter colours.

shot.caption: There's no title screen, the game pops up with this screen immediately forcing the players to define their keys
Defining the keys for player one. Showing the Amiga is a nice touch
